articles.title: India's Gautam Adani unseats Mukesh Ambani as Asia's richest billionaire - CNN
articles.description: India's Gautam Adani has overtaken his fellow countryman Mukesh Ambani to become the wealthiest person in Asia, according to Bloomberg's list of the world's richest people.
